answers.answer: With pregnancy diabetes your baby grows quicker my mom was delivered at 8 months because my brother was weigh 8 lbs at 8 months which is the weight of a full term baby and he had to stay 8 the hospital for and week or 2
I had it my baby was almost 9 lbs
